description:
JOIN MY COMMUNITY OF OVER 11,000 STUDENTS AND LEARN AMAZING TECHNIQUES, TIPS, TRICKS AND SECRETS THAT I'VE ACCUMULATED OVER 15 YEARS OF ACADEMIC AND PROFESSIONAL TRAINING!

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Created: 15 October 2014

Last Updated: 17 April 2015

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Course Achievements

  1. Over 1,700 Satisfied Students!
  2. Over 17 Positive Reviews
  3. Over 7,000 minutes consumed since release

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Course Description: Excel Demonstration for Beginners

Microsoft is an amazing and powerful program. Unfortunately, many people are scared and terrified of this program or simply don't understand what it is.

So I designed this course not to teach how use Excel per se, but instead to demonstrate just a few capabilities of what you can do and how easy it is to do it.

My hope is that you see the relevance and potential and see how you can apply it to your personal life, business, career, projects, etc.

If you take this course and decide to look into this a bit further by watching more of my courses, then I will consider this course a complete success.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Course Details

  1. This course has the shortest and simplest tutorial video's you will ever see! Clear, concise and to the point!
  2. It is designed for the beginner/intermediate but if you're looking to freshen up on your skills, come on in!
  3. I've intentionally made the video's around 2 minutes or less so that you get your information instantly. NO MORE USELESS CHATTER!!
  4. FULL AND FREE LIFETIME ACCESS
  5. All future lectures, videos, documents and upgrades included FREE

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Instructor Achievements

  1. Member of the Udemy Council
  2. +19,000 students (totalling ~40,000 enrolments)
  3. Average of 300-500 enrolments per day (Highest enrolment rate in one day was 1400 students)
  4. +500 Positive Reviews (5 Star Average Rating across all courses)
  5. +18 Live courses (+20 courses in production)
  6. Incorporated my Udemy courses into RMIT University Laboratory Tutorials for Undergraduate Aerospace Engineers

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++

What Udemy has said about the Instructor

'We looked at some data + feedback from your courses and found you ranked in the top group of instructors on Udemy! Students love taking courses from instructors they trust!'

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++

What students have already said about this course

  1. Yuliia The course is awesome! This is great tutorial for beginners just like me. Very detailed step-by-step explanations, explicit and easy to understand what excel can do and how you can use it.
  2. Abdullah-Al-Saim Excellent course!!!! This course helps me go through the basic things about excel. Jed is simply amazing and I like the teaching style. Eager for your next course.
  3. Nathan Little Perfect for Beginners. Thank you Jed on providing this Excel Course for beginners. I have needed this for a little while to quickly explain the simple but effective tools that this program can do to make my life a little easier. I also believe learning is much better when the instructor/teacher/presenter is enthusiastic about the material in which you are. Thanks again.
  4. April Alunsina Pagaling Excellent introduction to show the power and possibilities in Excel. Clear audio, nice video and the instructor was very well versed with the subject.
  5. Kip Ferguson Nice Overview. This 30 minute dive into Excel gives students the ability to get in and actually develop some solid Excel skills.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Enrol Now and Experience the Benefits

  1. I'll show you step-by-step, I'll explain and highlight every single button I press, I'll draw around important area's and icons with on-screen drawing tools, I'll zoom into small and hard to see area's so you don't miss a single thing!
  2. With over 15 years of experience using Microsoft Excel, I'll let you look over my shoulder as I teach you the fundamentals.
  3. I'll show you exactly how to master this technique in a fraction of the time it takes the average person to learn on their own from books, YouTube videos, blogs and forums!
  4. By mastering this technique you'll become the most productive and most efficient person at your job and at home!
  5. New doors and opportunities will begin opening up for you personally and professional with each new technique you acquire!

Click the â€œTAKE THIS COURSE" button, top right, NOW!!...every hour you delay you're missing out on huge opportunities!!
title: 30 Minute Excel Quick Start Via Functions Demonstration!
